content: version 1 above round 4 chain 2 blo double_crochet around join round 5 chain 2 double_crochet around join round 6 chain 2 double_crochet 2dc in the next stitch repeat * around join 36 dcs round 7 chain 2 double_crochet 2 2dc in the next stitch repeat * around join 48 dcs optional crab stitch edging finish off i tried the crab stitch edging on this hat crocheted with #3 cotton but didn t like it on the one i crocheted with two strands of #10 i did crab stitch with a single strand of the #10 that turned out cute i think a laced edge might look good but haven t tried it yet version 3 ball cap pattern starts here rounds 1-5 are the same as version 1 above round 6 slip_stitch loosely in next 9 stitches the join counts as one flo single_crochet double_crochet in the next stitch double_crochet treble_crochet in the next stitch 2tr in next 2 stitches treble_crochet double_crochet in the next stitch double_crochet single_crochet in the next stitch slip_stitch loosely in next 9 stitches finish off ©dawn smith august 17 2024
